item.title: MIUI V12.0.10.0.QCTINXM Fastboot update for Redmi 9 India
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 9 India

Codename: cattail

Version: V12.0.10.0.QCTINXM | 10.0

Size: 2.4 GB

MD5: cedd23bfcddb60178f8d0ed3950cf4d8

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to May 2021. Increased system security.
[Xiaomi Cloud]
New: Location info can be now reported automatically before the device is powered off

Download: Here
